properties.name: value
properties.description: Binds value property to input

properties.name: lg
properties.description: Large size - 464px

properties.name: md
properties.description: Medium size - 252px

properties.name: sm
properties.description: Small size -  144px

properties.name: placeholderMd
properties.description: Set placeholder smaller size than usual as 14px

properties.name: width
properties.description: Setup the width

properties.name: lang
properties.description: BCP 47 code. Language to be used in the calendar for month names and weekday labels. Can be set globally with $root.locale. This property overrides global setting

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label at the top of the input

properties.name: slideLabel
properties.description: Set up slideble input label

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Passed directly to the input

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disable input of calendar

properties.name: minDate
properties.description: Earliest selectable day for the calendar

properties.name: maxDate
properties.description: Latest selectable day for the calendar

properties.name: rangeStart
properties.description: Point of reference for the range property

properties.name: range
properties.description: An alternative to minDate/maxDate

properties.name: position
properties.description: Forwarded to calendar dropdown position.

properties.name: positionChangeable
properties.description: Set up changeable position of calendar depend on device resolution

properties.name: fullWidth
properties.description: Responsible for full width

properties.name: textAlign
properties.description: Used to specify the horizontal alignment of text

properties.name: iconSize
properties.description: Size for icon

properties.name: iconColor
properties.description: Icon color variable name or a CSS value

properties.name: iconPadding
properties.description: Set icon padding

properties.name: activeIcon
properties.description: When setup as true allow dispatch 'icon-click' event when click on Icon

properties.name: borderColorDesktop
properties.description: Set border color for desktop calendar

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: Set background color of calendar backdrop

properties.name: backdropOpacity
properties.description: Set opacity of calendar backdrop

properties.name: wrapperStyleObject
properties.description: Styles object responsible for styles which will be applied to calendar wrapper

properties.name: validators
properties.description: Array of validator Objects. When multiple validators fail, only one error is displayed, determined by their order in the array. Each Object should have three fields:

subProperty.name: message
subProperty.description: Error message that shown when validation fails

subProperty.name: validator
subProperty.description: Function that takes input value as an argument and returns Boolean

properties.name: showErrors
properties.description: Responsible for showing error message

properties.name: secondDate
properties.description: Binds secondDate property to input with value property when rangeAvailable set as true

properties.name: rangeAvailable
properties.description: Allowed select date range

properties.name: selectDayList
properties.description: Allowed display on desktop version of calendar sidebar on right side with list days for select of date range

properties.name: dayListPositive
properties.description: Set positive or negative days list range depend on the value

properties.name: shortMonthFormat
properties.description: Set as true for displaying date in next format: 23 Nov 2019

properties.name: iconLeft
properties.description: Display the icon on the left side instead of default right side

properties.name: marginDropdown
properties.description: Set a space between input and dropdown of calendar

properties.name: backlight
properties.description: Allow backlight for input when this prop equal as true

properties.name: inputBorderBacklight
properties.description: Backlight input border when calendar is open

properties.name: autoInitialize
properties.description: Responsible for auto initialize value of Calendar's input

properties.name: editableMode
properties.description: Allow manually writing date inside input of Calendar

properties.name: name
properties.description: With this property calendar will be listening to validation with current value for e.g. 'validateTest'

properties.name: validationClose
properties.description: When property is active validation will be triggered on close of dropdown or dialog

properties.name: usualModal
properties.description: Display usual modal window and set displayActions to true for datepicker in modal mode

properties.name: alt
properties.description: Set alternative styles for calendar

events.name: calendarVisible
events.description: Dispatched when calendar visible state is changed

events.name: inputFocus
events.description: Triggered when the input field of Calendar Component will dispatch focus event

events.name: inputBlur
events.description: Triggered when the input field of Calendar Component will dispatch blur event

events.name: icon-click
events.description: Dispatched when Icon get click and activeIcon prop is true

events.name: input
events.description: Emitted for updating the value props

events.name: update:secondDate
events.description: Emitted for updating the secondDate props

events.name: validation
events.description: Emitted when triggered the validate event

events.name: maxSelectedDate
events.description: Emitted when value and secondDate properties are defined, that's allow define is max selected date

events.name: minSelectedDate
events.description: Emitted when value and secondDate properties are defined, that's allow define is min selected date
